content.question: Block <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> has speed <math alttext="v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> immediately before colliding with identical Block <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> that is at rest. The blocks are on a horizontal surface and there is negligible friction between the blocks and the surface. During the collision, the amount of kinetic energy lost from the two-block system is <math alttext="K sub lost" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>lost</mtext></msub></math>. Immediately after the collision, Block <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> has speed <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and Block <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has speed <math alttext="v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following equations could be combined to determine a correct expression for <math alttext="K sub lost" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>lost</mtext></msub></math> in terms of <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="Line 1: v sub i equals, v sub 1, end sub, plus v sub 2. Line 2: v squared sub i, end sub, squared, equals, v squared sub i 1, end sub, squared, plus v squared ssub 2, end sub, squared, plus the fraction 2 over m, end fraction, times K sub lost." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>{</mo><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>lost</mtext></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="Line 1: v sub i equals, v sub 1, end sub, plus v sub 2. Line 2: v sub i, end sub, squared, equals, open parenthesis, v sub 1, end sub, plus v sub 2, close parenthesis, squared, plus the fraction 2 over m, end fraction, times K sub lost." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>{</mo><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>lost</mtext></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mpadded></math>

Line 2: v sub i, end sub, squared, equals, v sub 1, end sub, squared, plus v sub 2, end sub, squared, plus the fraction 2 over m, end fraction, times K sub lost." display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>{</mo><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mtable columnalign="right center left"><mtr><mtd><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mtd><mtd><mo>=</mo></mtd><mtd><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mfrac><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>lost</mtext></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
